mapper.insert: insert into publisher(name, remark, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, revision) values (#{publisher.name}, #{publisher.remark}, #{tokenBody.id}, NOW(), #{tokenBody.id}, NOW(), 0)
mapper.update:
update publisher p
p.name = #{publisher.name},
p.remark = #{publisher.remark},
p.`update_by` = #{publisher.updateBy},
p.`update_time` = NOW(), p.`revision` = (p.`revision` + 1) % 2147483647
where p.`publish_id` = #{id} and p.`revision` = #{publisher.revision};
mapper.select: select p.`publish_id`, p.`name`, p.`remark`, p.`create_by`, p.`create_time`, p.`update_by`, p.`update_time`, p.`revision` from publisher p where p.`publish_id` = #{id}

p.`name`,

p.`revision`
